title: Three arrested with 6,000 Yaba pills in city
body: The Detective Branch of Dhaka Metropolitan Police have arrested three suspected drug dealers and seized 6,000 Yaba pills in separate raids in the capital Dhaka. The arrested are Md Rafique, 63, Shamsunnahar Munni, 40, and Rasna Akter, 42, said a DMP press release on Tuesday. According to the police, teams of DB Gulshan division conducted raids at Malibagh, Gabtali and Kalyanpur areas between 11:00pm on Monday and 2:00am on Tuesday and made the arrests. Rafique was arrested from Malibagh, Munni from Gabtali and Rasna from Kalyanpur, said police, adding that 2,000 Yaba pills were recovered from each of them. Police suspected that all the three arrested were active members of a drug dealing network and stored the seized Yaba tablets for sale. Legal proceedings against the arrested are under way, police said.
